name: MTLAccelerationStructureUsage
desc: Options that describe which tasks you can perform on an acceleration structure and how the system performs those tasks.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates new usage options from a raw integer value.

items.name: static var refit: MTLAccelerationStructureUsage
items.desc: An option that specifies that you can refit the acceleration structure if the geometry changes.

items.name: static var preferFastBuild: MTLAccelerationStructureUsage
items.desc: An option that specifies that Metal needs to build the acceleration structure quickly, even if that reduces ray-tracing performance.

items.name: static var extendedLimits: MTLAccelerationStructureUsage
items.desc: An option that specifies that Metal needs to allow larger ray-tracing limits for the acceleration structure.
